A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has wiped out the entire legacy of George Lucas\, this is not Star Wars\, there is no honor\, there is no emotional conflict\, it is confusing and incomplete. The problem was not the fate of the Skywalkers\, the problem is the fate of the whole series\, Yoda's words were written by Mickey Mouse and that's it. There are no more rules and traditions within the Star Wars universe\, or abandon or accept this superficial generation and want quick answers to everything.
